classes.description: Details about various stand-up comedy specials and performances.

properties.name: specialTitle
properties.description: Name of the comedy special or performance.

properties.name: description
properties.description: A brief description of the comedic themes or topics covered.

properties.name: duration
properties.description: Duration of the special, e.g., '1 hour 30 minutes'.

properties.name: biography
properties.description: Brief biography or background of the comedian.
